snippet.title: Why is mont blanc called mont blanc
snippet.description: It is French and literally means White Mountain, or more accurately Mt. White.

snippet.title: What is cycling
snippet.description: It simply means riding a bike. It can be done as a pastime simply for enjoyment, or as a means of transport, or as means of keeping fit, or as a competitive sport.
